name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, HeyMan, Magb, blarghamagarky, aperson)

name: madnes
text: There is no shame in being gay due to Morten Harket.

name: jhunter
text: a fellow once told me i resembled him. i said thank you, and then i slapped him, because he was a god damned liar.

name: tinhand
text: I don't quite get the appeal of meeting celebrities in real life. There'd be so much pressure to be cool.

name: apocowarg
text: But it's A-ha! You could reinact the video Take On Me in it's entirety!

name: gormster
text: piiiiipe wreeeench fiiiiiiight

name: ravindra108
text: http://www.funnyordie.com/videos/e062d7b4d5/take-on-me-literal-video-version-from-dustfilms

name: petro
text: A comment left by petro was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, straw, featurelessvoid, ButterMoths, Thorfinn, Bourbonsamurai, Bacter, mystkmanat, coldfrog, nutmeg, Boredom_Man, Audhumla, blarghamagarky, libelandslander)

name: semiquaver
text: Am I the only one who thinks this is wonderful?

name: dovey
text: Yes, apparently.

name: dovey
text: At least 12 people think it is not.

name: semiquaver
text: I don't understand WHY not.  ;-;

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Probably because he said "faggots".

Also because he said "Norwegian" and that reminds people of Vikings, which are scary.

name: semiquaver
text:
Speaking as a gay person, I've learned that uses of that term term can be quite gentle, if applied VERY carefully within a considerate context.

The term "faggots," on the other hand, is right on the fucking edge. I see that now.

name: steerpike66
text: I didn't really notice; i just assumed he was using it from the inside, as it were. Better to stick to queers and maybe fags if you want to assimilate terms. Faggot is still 24 carat nasty-ass in my book.

name: semiquaver
text: I thought it was sort of in the obscene-poetic vein.

name: thommy_h
text: Something good about this strip: it wasn't a contest to win them, but a raffle , with little tickets and the mayor putting his hand in a big hat.

name: professorhazard
text: Nothing terrible got on the Mayor and a good time was had by all.

name: biznart
text: I think the real punchline is in panel 2.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I wish this happened in real life. The part I would throw with Duran Duran as entertainment

name: blarghamagarky
text: Party. The party I would throw. Party.

name: semiquaver
text: This is massively funnier if you imagine that you're throwing parts around.  Duran Duran don't need no fuckin' parts on their nice jackets, but they gots to entertain because you won them fair and square.  What a dilemma.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I don't know I would be nice to them they could like hang out with my friends we are pretty cool. But yeah that would have to play all their hits for drunk college kids in a shitty house

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah that is true and yet you are extending the dilemma...shitty house with nice yet drunk people.  One assumes that after a certain point in the booze chronology of the evening they would make their escape and go find somewhere that served fish and chips late and then repackage them in newspaper like british folks.

name: blarghamagarky
text: or maybe they would fall in love with us and we would become close friends and they'd come back and visit often? This is what I, rather hopefully, invision in my mind.

name: semiquaver
text:
I agree that this is a nicer scenario. Probably they would just order like twenty more fish and chips and you all would have a party.

I'm hungry.

name: farqussus
text: I think they would talk to your parents on the patio about gazebos and the difficulties of lawn maintenance.

name: semiquaver
text: Point.

name: dovey
text: I imagined you'd still won A-Ha in the raffle, but just invited Duran Duran along to the party, and they came because they were interested in coming to the "I won A-Ha party!"

name: ghede
text:
Taaaaaaaake ooooon meeeeeee. Take on me.
Taaaaaaaake meeeee ooooooon. Take on me.

name: jezebel
text: You're somehow in my mind.  As I was reading down the posts, I was singing the song.  When I got to yours, I was singing the chorus.  It was creepy.  And extremely awesome.

name: gussiejives
text: I coulda sworn it would have been Pet Shop Boys that made him gay.

name: tekende
text: No one knows what made that little robot gay.

name: charchar
text: My god, I am jealous of a stuffed bear.  First his life was spared by Roosevelt and now this?

name: mikeronomicon
text: "So.....that makes you a gay robot then..." RvB meets achewood. There's something to give you nightmares.
